thread.title: J.J. Watt Confirms Relationship With Kealia Ohai « CBS Houston
thread.title_full: J.J. Watt Confirms Relationship With Kealia Ohai « CBS Houston

author: Garret Heinrich
title: J.J. Watt Confirms Relationship With Kealia Ohai « CBS Houston
text:
J.J. Watt Confirms Relationship With Kealia Ohai January 31, 2017 12:45 PM By Garret Heinrich HOUSTON, TX - JANUARY 09: J.J. Watt #99 of the Houston Texans warms up before playing against the Kansas City Chiefs during the AFC Wild Card Playoff game at NRG Stadium on January 9, 2016 in Houston, Texas. (Photo by Bob Levey/Getty Images) 
Houston (CBS HOUSTON) – We already knew Houston Texans star J.J. Watt and Houston Dash and USWNT forward Kealia Ohai were a couple. Ohai confirmed this in October , but Watt had never confirmed the two were a couple. 
On Tuesday Watt Instagram a picture of the two of them at the beach, watching Kealia a Happy Birthday and calling her “beautiful.” A photo posted by JJ Watt (@justinjames99) on Jan 31, 2017 at 5:26am PST 
Ohai is now 25-years old entering her 3rd season with the Houston Dash she is the sister-in-law to Brian Cushing. Garret Heinrich The digital content manager of CBS Radio Houston, Garret is a father, husband, sports fan and former comedian. Follow Garret On Twitter @GarretHeinrich
